title:Destiny Massive Breakdown-inspired weapon rolls
description:Not affiliated with the DMB podcast, but based on their discussions

title:Season 12 Beyond Light Europan weapons from Podcast 186
description:Weapons from Variks and Europan activities

// Arctic Haze (PvP first choice roll)
//notes:Inspired by Destiny Massive Breakdowns Podcast 186 Part 1. PvP first choice roll. Recommended MW: Stability with Counterbalance mod.

dimwishlist:item=20935540&perks=839105230,3177308360,2450788523,699525795

description:New perks on Tigerspite, Twilight Oath and Abide the Return

// Tigerspite (PvP/PvE first choice roll)
//notes:Inspired by Destiny Massive Breakdowns Podcast 219. PvP/PvE first choice roll. Recommended MW: Stability. Perk set not great for PvE.

@title:Ep 287: Season 19 (Season of Seraph) Rose and Exalted Truth
@description:Early thoughts on new S-Tier Hand Cannons

// Rose (PvP first choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds, Slideshot, Rangefinder, Smooth Grip 
// Rose (PvP first choice roll)
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for mobile playstyle duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds with Smooth Grip and a Stability Masterwork get you a great shape. For a mobile playstyle, Slideshot layers Range and Stability, and Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom. Recommended MW: Stability, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=1840239774,3142289711,3161816588,2846385770

// Rose (PvP backup roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds, Perpetual Motion, Rangefinder, Smooth Grip 
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backup PvP pick for mobile playstyle duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks with a Smooth Grip and Stability Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For a mobile playstyle, Slideshot adds Range and Stability or Perpetual Motion adds additional Handling and Stability, and Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom. Recommended MW: Stability, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=1840239774,3142289711,1428297954,2846385770

// Rose (PvP backup roll)
// (Arrowhead Brake, Corkscrew Rifling), Accurized Rounds, (Slideshot, Perpetual Motion), Rangefinder, Smooth Grip
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backup PvP pick for mobile playstyle duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks with a Smooth Grip and Stability Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For a mobile playstyle, Slideshot layers Range and Stability, and Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom. Recommended MW: Stability, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=839105230,3142289711,3161816588,2846385770

dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=4090651448,3142289711,1428297954,2846385770

// Rose (PvP backup roll)
// (Hammer-Forged Rifling, Smallbore), (Flared Magwell, Tactical Mag), (Slideshot, Perpetual Motion), Rangefinder, Smooth Grip
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backup PvP pick for mobile playstyle duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks with a Smooth Grip and Stability Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For a mobile playstyle, Slideshot layers Range and Stability, and Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom. Recommended MW: Stability, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller

// Rose (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds, (Moving Target Elemental Capacitor), (Rangefinder, Eye of the Storm, Snapshot Sights, Explosive Payload), Smooth Grip 
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First choice PvP pick for duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Smooth Grip and Stability Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For pure duelling, your first trait column options are Moving Target for more aim assist, or Elemental Capacity with an Arc subclass for a huge boost to Handling or Void for Stability. In the second trait column, Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom, Eye of the Storm gives big boosts to crit-hitting stats in a gunfight, Snapshot Sights gets you ADSed and ready to shoot first in an exchange, or Explosive Payload extends your useful range and adds blinding flinch. Recommended MW: Stability, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, MKB, Controller

Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. // Rose (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds, (Moving Target Elemental Capacitor), (Rangefinder, Eye of the Storm, Snapshot Sights, Explosive Payload), Smooth Grip 
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Fire-choice PvP pick for in-air duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Smooth Grip and Stability Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For pure duelling, your first trait column options are Moving Target for more aim assist, or Elemental Capacity with an Arc subclass for a huge boost to Handling or Void for Stability. In the second trait column, Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom, Eye of the Storm gives big boosts to crit-hitting stats in a gunfight, Snapshot Sights gets you ADSed and ready to shoot first in an exchange, or Explosive Payload extends your useful range and adds blinding flinch. // Rose (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, (Slideshot, Perpetual Motion), (Eye of the Storm, Opening Shot) 
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Fire-choice PvP pick for in-air duelling. Unique subfamily of a Lightweight 140RPM Hand Cannon - adds 20 Mobility (so you only need 80 on your armour to hit 100), and a 6.25% speed boost. Great stats - 85 aim assist, 20 Airborne Effectiveness and 11 in the mag - plus it has an epic set of consistency traits in third and fourth columns, which makes virtually every combination interesting for duelling. Optimal TTK of 0.87s with 3 crits. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel - Fluted Barrel is best - and maximise your Airborne Effectiveness with Extended Mag. Add a Smooth Grip and Stability Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon with an AE of 30. In-air duelling, means a highly mobile playstyle, so naturally pair with Slideshot for increased range and stability, or Perpetual Motions for Handling and Stability. Your second column trait depends on whether you want to maximise your accuracy in-fight with Eye of the Storm or on your initial shot with Opening Shot. Recommended MW: Stability, with an Icarus Grip mod to increase AE to 45. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=1840239774,2420895100,3161816588,699525795
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=1840239774,2420895100,1428297954,699525795
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=1840239774,2420895100,3161816588,47981717
dimwishlist:item=882778888&perks=1840239774,2420895100,1428297954,47981717

// Exalted Truth (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Perfect Float, Eye of the Storm
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for in-air duelling. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits). Highest Airborne Effectiveness of any 140 HC so, with the right perks you could build into a mobile aerial playstyle. Fluted Barrel adds Handling and Stability, and Extended Mag adds AE. Perfect Float adds more AE just for being in combat and, let's face it, if you're in the air you'll probably be taking damage, so turn that into a benefit with Eye of the Storm. Recommended MW: Handling, with an Icarus Grip mod to increase AE to 47. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,2420895100,2272927194,699525795

// Exalted Truth (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Killing Wind, Rampage
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. Killing Wind and Rampage pair well to make follow-up kills easier - Killing Wind noticably improves gunfeel and Rampage x1 means you only need 2 crits and a body. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,3425386926

// Exalted Truth (PvP backup roll)
// (Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell), Killing Wind, Rampage
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backup PvP pick for kill-chaining. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. Killing Wind and Rampage pair well to make follow-up kills easier - Killing Wind noticably improves gunfeel and Rampage x1 means you only need 2 crits and a body. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, MKB, Controller

// Exalted Truth (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Rangefinder, Eye of the Storm
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for duelling. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - via Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For a duelling roll, Rangefinder adds all the benefits of +1 Zoom and Eye of the Storm gives big boosts to crit-hitting stats in a gunfight. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2846385770,699525795

// Exalted Truth (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Outlaw, (Kill Clip, Rampage)
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - via Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. Outlaw is the classic partner for Rampage or Kill Clip - Rampage x1 means you only need 2 crits and a body, while Kill Clip or Rampage x3 will reduce that further to 1 crit and 2 bodies. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,3142289711,1168162263,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,3142289711,1168162263,3425386926

// Exalted Truth (PvP backup roll)
// (Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell), Outlaw, (Kill Clip, Rampage)
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backupe PvP pick for kill-chaining. // Exalted Truth (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Killing Wind, Repulsor Brace
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - via Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For kill chaining, Killing Wind in the first trait column noticably improves gunfeel on a kill. Then take advantage of Void 3.0 verbs with Repulsor Brace in the second (looking at all you Gyrfalcon Hunters) to get a void overshield as you search for your next target. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,776531651

// (Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell), Killing Wind, Repulsor Brace

// Exalted Truth (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Killing Wind, Encore
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For kill chaining, Killing Wind in the first trait column noticably improves gunfeel on a kill. Encore is an interesting second column pick - improve range with crit kills, or make crits easier with bodyshot kills. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3102421004&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,1195158366

//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). // Exalted Truth (Adept) (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Perfect Float, Eye of the Storm
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for in-air duelling. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits). Highest Airborne Effectiveness of any 140 HC so, with the right perks you could build into a mobile aerial playstyle. Fluted Barrel adds Handling and Stability, and Extended Mag adds AE. Perfect Float adds more AE just for being in combat and, let's face it, if you're in the air you'll probably be taking damage, so turn that into a benefit with Eye of the Storm. Recommended MW: Handling, with an Adept Icarus Grip mod to increase AE to 47. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,2420895100,2272927194,699525795

// Exalted Truth (Adept) (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Killing Wind, Rampage
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. Killing Wind and Rampage pair well to make follow-up kills easier - Killing Wind noticably improves gunfeel and Rampage x1 means you only need 2 crits and a body. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod, or an Adept Range, Stability or Handling mod, or an Adept Range, Stability or Handling mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,3425386926

dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,10690939,1168162263,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1482024992,10690939,1168162263,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,3230963543,1168162263,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1482024992,3230963543,1168162263,3425386926

// Exalted Truth (Adept) (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Killing Wind, Repulsor Brace
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - via Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For kill chaining, Killing Wind in the first trait column noticably improves gunfeel on a kill. Then take advantage of Void 3.0 verbs with Repulsor Brace in the second (looking at all you Gyrfalcon Hunters) to get a void overshield as you search for your next target. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod, or an Adept Range, Stability or Handling mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,776531651

// Exalted Truth (Adept) (PvP backup roll)
// (Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell), Killing Wind, Repulsor Brace
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backup PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For kill chaining, Killing Wind in the first trait column noticably improves gunfeel on a kill. Then take advantage of Void 3.0 verbs with Repulsor Brace in the second (looking at all you Gyrfalcon Hunters) to get a void overshield as you search for your next target. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod, or an Adept Range, Stability or Handling mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,10690939,2450788523,776531651
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1482024992,10690939,2450788523,776531651
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2450788523,776531651

// Exalted Truth (Adept) (PvP first-choice roll)
// Fluted Barrel, Extended Mag, Killing Wind, Encore
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For kill chaining, Killing Wind in the first trait column noticably improves gunfeel on a kill. Encore is an interesting second column pick - improve range with crit kills, or make crits easier with bodyshot kills. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod, or an Adept Range, Stability or Handling mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,1195158366

// Exalted Truth (Adept) (PvP backup roll)
// (Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling), (Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell), Killing Wind, Encore
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 287 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/2Er856J2Tunt6GP8DxzK2X?si=db7944e1fcbd403d). Backup PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. S-Tier hand cannon as at v6.3.0.2 - a stat monster, although Aim Assist is a little low (but hey, you're in Trials because you don't need help to hit your crits, right?). Void energy, so you use this to build into your void 3.0 subclasses and exotics. As with all Adaptive Hand Cannons, optimal time to kill is 0.87s with (3 crits) out of the box. Look to get the "stepladder" of Range < Stability < Handling with your barrel and mag perks - Fluted Barrel and Accurized Rounds - with a Handling Masterwork, so you get a snappy, controllable, flinch-resistant hand cannon. For kill chaining, Killing Wind in the first trait column noticably improves gunfeel on a kill. Encore is an interesting second column pick - improve range with crit kills, or make crits easier with bodyshot kills. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod, or an Adept Range, Stability or Handling mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,10690939,2450788523,1195158366
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1482024992,10690939,2450788523,1195158366
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2450788523,1195158366
dimwishlist:item=3920882229&perks=1482024992,3230963543,2450788523,1195158366

@title:Ep 288: Season of the Dawning IB weapons
// Stay Frosty
// Barrel and mag options
//Arrowhead Brake, (High Caliber Rounds, Flared Magwell)
// Arrowhead Brake takes the Recoil Direction to a controllable 85 and, with the high rate of fire, High-Caliber Rounds can put out some significant flinch as well as adding some range or, to pair with traits that require a reload to proc, Flared Magwell give the biggest boost to reload speed.
// Trait options
// (Tunnel Vision, Killing Wind, Encore), Desperado
// Desperado's increase in fire rate drops the optimal TTK to 0.73s (7c, 1b) and accuracy adjusted TTK to 0.8s (6c, 3b). You'll need to hit your headshots which Tunnel Vision helps with - also procced on reload. Alternatively, Encore or Killing Wind can both help with hitting your headshots for kill-chaining. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with a Targeting Adjuster, Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod.
// (Killing Wind, Encore, Tunnel Vision), Headstone
// Headstone is a bit of a sleeper trait for Trials and PvP modes with revives, as the Stasis Crystal generated from a crit kill prevents accessing an orb, giving you a numberical advantage for longer, or you can break the crystals if anyone is nearby for Dragonfly-like AOE damage. Killing Wind and Encore proc on a kill to make hitting follow-up crits easier, for kill chaining. Recommended MW: Range, with a Targeting Adjuster, Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod.
// (Tunnel Vision, Killing Wind, Encore), Kill Clip
// Kill Clip on its own will allow you to two burst up to 4 resilience in 0.53s (5c 1b), or if you have any other damage boost triggered, like Radiant, will two burst up to 10 resilience. You'll need to hit your headshots which Tunnel Vision helps with - also procced on reload. Alternatively, Encore or Killing Wind can both help with hitting your headshots for kill-chaining. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with a Targeting Adjuster, Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod.

// Cold Front
// Aggressive Frame with lowish stats by comparison with in-slot competitors, including a Zoom of 14 - one lower than its peers. If you already have a decently rolled Extraordinary Rendition, then you probably don't need to worry too much about saving a good roll. The Hakke origin perk can be useful in breaking Titan Barricades, you're finding them annoying! Optimal TTK of 0.77s with 8 crits and 2 bodies. 
// Barrel and mag options
// Hammer Forged Rifling, Accurized Rounds
// Use your barrel, mag and masterwork to push out your range as far as you can without damaging any other stats. Hammer-Forged Rifling and Accurized Rounds are your best options for this.
// Trait options
// Tap the Trigger, Cascade Point
// Cascade Point is a Desperado-like trait procced like Harmony. It has a short window to use but reduces your optimal TTK to 0.5s (8c 2b) for kill-chaining. You still need to hit crit shots, and Tap the Trigger assists with controlling the poor stability. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling mod.
// (Tap the Trigger, Perpetual Motion), Rangefinder
// For duelling, use consistency traits in your firet column to help control the recoil, and Rangefinder to push your range and aim assist out as far as it will go. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with a Targeting Adjuster, Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod.
// (Tap the Trigger, Perpetual Motion), Rampage
// One stack of Rampage will reduce your TTK to 0.67s (8c 1b), while either Tap the Trigger or Perpetual Motion will help control your recoil to hit your crits and also, for Perpetual Motion, add handling and reload speed. Recommended MW: Range, with a Targeting Adjuster, Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod.
// (Tap the Trigger, Perpetual Motion), Frenzy
// One stack of Rampage will reduce your TTK to 0.67s and make it easier to hit (6c 3b), while either Tap the Trigger or Perpetual Motion will help control your recoil to hit your crits and also, for Perpetual Motion, add handling and reload speed. Recommended MW: Range, with a Targeting Adjuster, Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod.

// Glacioclasm
// Aggressive Frame with the highest range and zoom, but the lowest aim assist and, with no Rangefinder, this can still be outranged by a Precision Frame with the perk. Unfortunately, you probably won't get much value out of either Origin trait unless you can pick up extra ammo in combat. You'll need to practice pre-charging as this is very slow firing - the TTK is 1.09s with four bolts - a rapid fire can get two shots off in the same time, and most primaries will kill you if you're charging out in the open. 
// Barrel and mag options
// Extended Barrel, Projection Fuse
// With High-Impacts only shooting five bolts you have less recoil to compensate for and can invest into range with your barrel, battery and Masterwork - Extended Barrel takes your recoil direction to 88 as well.
// Trait options
// Under Pressure, High-Impact Reserves
// You'll rarely have more than two shots you spawn with, so both Under Pressure, improving your stability and accuracy, and High-Impact Reserves, improves consistency by reducing the number of bolts to kill to three, will be pretty much permanently procced, for duelling. Recommended MW: Range, with a Targeting Adjuster mod.
// Slideshot, Kickstart
// If you can master sliding while precharging (and that's a big if) with Slideshot and Kickstart, you can offset the sliding penalty to stability and boost your range, and reduce your charge time and boost damage by 20%, your TTK drops to 0.87s with three bolts. You only have the narrowest of windows to co-ordinate all those moving parts, though. Recommended MW: Range, with a Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// Under Pressure, Eye of the Storm
// You'll rarely have more than two shots you spawn with, so both Under Pressure, improving your stability and accuracy will be pretty much permanently procced, for duelling. And chances are that, once you step out while you're precharging, you'll start taking damage which means all the accuracy bonuses from Eye of the Storm will mean your bolts will have a much better chance of connext. Recommended MW: Range, with a Targeting Adjuster mod.

// Avalanche
// Arrowhead Brake, Ricochet Rounds, Dynamic Sway Reduction, Tap the Trigger
// LMGs aren't in any way meta as at Season 19. The optimal TTK is 0.53s with 5 crits and accuracy-adjusted TTK is 0.67s (2c, 4b), out of the box. If you've got a decent Commemoration, Corrective Measure or Unwavering Duty tucked away, you don't need to worry about keeping a PvP roll of this, although the Aim Assist of 90 is very attractive! If you don't, sort out the recoil direction with Arrowhead Brake, and add range and stability wth Ricochet Rounds. With a limited number of rounds, you'll need to make the most of them so consistency perks like Dynamic Sway Reduction and Tap the Trigger will help with hitting headshots while duelling. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.

// Zephyr
// Jagged Edge, Swordmaster's Guard, Duellist's Trance, Assassin's Blade
// Swords are not in any way meta as at Season 19, and are pretty much have all the same stats (except Bequest from the DSC Raid, or Quickfang). If you must use one, Jagged Edge gives you the greatest damage, Swordmaster's Guard maximises your heavy attack charge time, and Duellest's Trance and Assassin's Blade are the most PvP oriented traits for kill-chaining, improving its charge rate, efficiency, defence, movement speed, damage and lunge distance after your first kill. Reccomended MW: Impact with a Quick Access Sling mod.

//// Dark Decider
// Rapid-fire frame with in-band stats by comparison with other energy-slot peers. The Iron Banner origin trait can be very useful to keep you alive, post-gunfight as, with auto rifles you'll always likely be taking damage in a duel, or Veist Stinger adds ADS movement speed and the occasional magazine refresh - your choice. Optimal TTK of 0.77s with 10 crits, and an accuracy-adjusted TTK of 0.93s (6c 6b) at base.
// Barrel and mag options
// Arrowhead Brake, Accurized Rounds
// With the high rate of fire, you'll need both Arrowhead Brake and a Counterbalance Stock mod to get the recoil direction to 88. Accurized Rounds adds 1.5m range and aim assist falloff.
// Trait options
// Dynamic Sway Reduction, Rangefinder
// For duelling, pick consistency traits in the first and second column - Dynamic Sway Reduction adds 10 stability and increases your accuracy as you fire, while Rangefinder adds 1 Zoom, and an additional 2.5m of range. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// (Dynamic Sway Reduction Subsistence), Golden Tricorn
// For kill-chaining, Golden Tricorn x1 reduces optimal TTK to 0.67s (8c, 1b) and accuracy-adjusted TTK to 0.77s (6c, 4b) and, being an arc weapon, you have a halfway decent chance of proccing two stacks with a matching ability kill. This takes your TTK down to a ridiculous 0.5s (6c, 1b) and accuracy adjusted TTK to 0.67s (5c, 4b). Dynamic Sway Reduction adds 10 stability and increases your accuracy as you fire or, if you're on a real tear, Subsistence will prevent the need to stop and reload to make the most of your damage boost. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// Dynamic Sway Reduction, Dragonfly
// Dragonfly can make kill-chaining easier by proccing AOE damage on nearby opponents on a crit kill, and you have a combination of a big magazine and Dynamic Sway Reduction for clean-ups. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// Flared Magwell, Dynamic Sway Reduction, Voltshot
// Maybe not the obvious choice for PvP but, for kill-chaining, get a kill, use Flared Magwell and a Reload Speed Masterwork to reload as fast as possible, and then prepare for some memeable clips in sixes with Voltshot, using your big magazine and Dyamic Sway Reduction to clean up anyone caught in the blast. Recommended MW: Reload Speed, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.


// Gunnora's Axe
// Pretty decent stats for a slug shotgun except Aim Assistance, where it's pretty much similar to its peers in the energy slot - Bonechiller being the standout (and Heritage, obviously, in the kinetic slot). The Iron Banner origin trait can be very useful to keep you alive, post-gunfight if you're using this as a holdout weapon. 
// Build options
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds, Moving Target, Opening Shot
// If you're planning to ADS, Fluted Barrel increases your handling for snappier swap and ADS speed, Accurized Rounds pushes your range out, and a combination of Moving Target and Opening Shot adds 30 aim assistance, to nudge it towards a competitive stat total. Recommended MW: Handling or Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds, Hip-Fire Grip, Opening Shot
// If you're planning to hip fire - the range is compressed whether you're ADSed or not - Fluted Barrel increases your handling for snappier swap speed, Accurized Rounds pushes your range out, and a combination of Hip-Fire Grip and Opening Shot adds aim assistance, to nudge it towards a competitive stat total. Recommended MW: Handling or Range, with a Freehand Grip, Quick Access Sling or Targeting Adjuster mod.

// Albruna-D
// As with all playlist weapons in season, try to reset your reputation as many times as you can before you cash in your engrams, to get as many rolls with double trait options and maximise your chances of the roll you're looking for. Aggressive Frame snipers can obviously one crit anything in PvP - this has lowish stats with a reasonable 45 zoom, but some interesting perk combinations to compensate. The Iron Banner origin trait can be very useful to keep you alive, post-gunfight if you've taken damage. 
// Barrel and mag options
// Fluted Barrel, Accurized Rounds
// Fluted Barrel increases your handing for faster equip and ADS speed, and Accurized Rounds pushes out your aim assist a little.
// Trait options
// (Elemental Capacitor - Arc, Surplus, Perpetual Motion), Harmony
// In the first trait column you can get lots of gunfeel bonus perks depending on your playstyle, but we're specifically looking for more handling for the fastest swap speed possible - Elemental Capacitor with an Arc subclass gives you an always on handling bonus of 50, Surplus or Perpetual Motion bonuses depend on how actively you use abilities and keep moving. The playloop would be to use Harmony to get a kill with your primary weapon and then swap for the 20% damage bonus. On it's own that will body shot up to 4/5 resilience and with any additional damage bonus - say, Radiant - you can one shot to the body at any resilience. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// (Elemental Capacitor - Arc, Surplus, Moving Target, Perpetual Motion), (Snapshot Sights, Opening Shot)
// For a duelling roll, you can get lots of gunfeel bonus perks in the first trait column depending on your playstyle - Elemental Capacitor with an Arc subclass gives you an always on handling bonus of 50, Surplus or Perpetual Motion bonuses depend on how actively you use abilities and keep moving. In the second trait column, Snapshot Sights will help ADS speed further, or Opening Shot adds 20 Aim Assist and range - you preference as to what you prefer. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod.
// No Distractions, (Opening Shot, Eye of the Storm)
// For holding down a lane No Distractions if helpful to resist flinch, and Opening Shot adds 20 Aim Assist and range, or Eye of the Storm boosts your accuracy if you take damage. Recommended MW: Range, with a Targeting Adjuster mod.

// Hung Jury SR4 (PvP first-choice roll) - also Adept rolls
// Build options
// Fluted Barrel, Steady Roads, Rapid Hit, Box Breathing
// Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 275 conversation with @DefyFly. First-choice PvP roll for duelling. The Omolon origin trait is great at the top of a magazine, where you should be getting your kills. Out of the box, optomal TTK is a slow 1.0s with 3 crits and a body or accuracy-adjusted TTK of 1.33s (1c, 4b). The main draw for Hung Jury as at v6.2.0.6 is Box Breathing in the second trait column, which means you can three tap any resilience (0.67s TTK - 2c, 1b) and two tap tap crit up to 8 resilience in 0.33s, as at Season 19 v6.3.0.2. To proc it though, you need to almost treat the weapon like it needs pre-charging by ADS-ing before an ancounter, for your first shot. It goes without saying, you need to land crits and stay mobile. You don't need extra range, so focus on Handling and Stability with your barrel and mag. Rapid Hit in the first trait column helps further with Stability (as well as a Reload Speed boost). Recommended MW: Handling, with a Radar Tuner (to help you stay aware of your surroundings if hardscoping), Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duelling, PvP-God, MKB, Controller

// Hung Jury SR4 (PvP backup roll)
// (Fluted Barrel, Corkscrew Rifling, Arrowhead Brake), (Steady Roads, Tactical Mag, Flared Magwell), (Rapid Hit, Surplus), Box Breathing
// Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 275 conversation with @DefyFly. Backup PvP roll for duelling. The Omolon origin trait is great at the top of a magazine, where you should be getting your kills. Out of the box, optomal TTK is a slow 1.0s with 3 crits and a body or accuracy-adjusted TTK of 1.33s (1c, 4b). The main draw for Hung Jury as at v6.2.0.6 is Box Breathing in the second trait column, which means you can three tap any resilience (0.67s TTK - 2c, 1b) and two tap tap crit up to 8 resilience in 0.33s, as at Season 19 v6.3.0.2. To proc it though, you need to almost treat the weapon like it needs pre-charging by ADS-ing before an ancounter, for your first shot. It goes without saying, you need to land crits and stay mobile. You don't need extra range, so focus on Handling and Stability with your barrel and mag. Rapid Hit in the first trait column helps further with Stability (as well as a Reload Speed boost), or Surplus adds gunfeel boosts as long as you hang on to your abilities. Recommended MW: Handling, with a Radar Tuner (to help you stay aware of your surroundings if hardscoping), Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duelling, MKB, Controller

// Hung Jury (PvP first choice roll)
// (Polygonal Rifling, Smallbore, Corkscrew Rifling), Steady Rounds, (Rapid Hit, Surplus), Explosive Payload
Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 222. PvP first choice roll for dualling. The Omolon origin trait is great at the top of a magazine, where you should be getting your kills. Out of the box, optomal TTK is a slow 1.0s with 3 crits and a body or accuracy-adjusted TTK of 1.33s (1c, 4b), so this is probably one to tuck away in case scout rifles ever get a buff. It goes without saying, you need to land crits and stay mobile. You don't need extra range, so focus on Handling and stability with your barrel and mag. Rapid Hit helps further with Stability (as well as a Reload Speed boost), or Surplus adds gunfeel boosts as long as you hang on to your abilities. Explosive Payload adds flinch and visual flinch to help with your duels. Recommended MW: Handling with a Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duelling, MKB, Controller

// Hung Jury (PvP backup roll)
// (Polygonal Rifling, Smallbore, Corkscrew Rifling), Steady Rounds, (Rapid Hit, Surplus), Adagio
Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 222. Backup roll for kill-chaining. The Omolon origin trait is great at the top of a magazine, where you should be getting your kills. Out of the box, optomal TTK is a slow 1.0s with 3 crits and a body or accuracy-adjusted TTK of 1.33s (1c, 4b), so this is probably one to tuck away in case scout rifles ever get a buff. It goes without saying, you need to land crits and stay mobile. You don't need extra range, so focus on Handling and stability with your barrel and mag. Rapid Hit helps further with Stability (as well as a Reload Speed boost), or Surplus adds gunfeel boosts as long as you hang on to your abilities. Adagio, once procced, drops your TTK to 0.78s (2c, 1b). Recommended MW: Handling with a Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, MKB, Controller

// Hung Jury (PvP backup roll)
// (Polygonal Rifling, Smallbore, Corkscrew Rifling), Steady Rounds, (Rapid Hit, Surplus), Firefly
Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 222. PvP backup roll for kill-chaining. The Omolon origin trait is great at the top of a magazine, where you should be getting your kills. Out of the box, optomal TTK is a slow 1.0s with 3 crits and a body or accuracy-adjusted TTK of 1.33s (1c, 4b), so this is probably one to tuck away in case scout rifles ever get a buff. It goes without saying, you need to land crits and stay mobile. You don't need extra range, so focus on Handling and stability with your barrel and mag. Rapid Hit helps further with Stability (as well as a Reload Speed boost), or Surplus adds gunfeel boosts as long as you hang on to your abilities. Dragonfly procs on crit kills will give you a group of damaged opponents nearby, ready for cleanup kill-chaining. Recommended MW: Handling with a Quick Access Sling or Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, MKB, Controller

// Wendigo - also Adept rolls
// (Volatile Launch, Quick Launch), (High-Explosive Ordnance, High-Velocity Rounds, Proximity Grenades), (Impulse Amplifier, Chain Reaction), Golden Tricorn
// PvP first-choice roll for kill-chaining. Unfortunately, none of the origin traits are particularly helpful in PvP - Vanguard's Vindication is the least worst of the bunch. You want your grenades to get to the target as fast as possible with as large a blast radius as possible, so take your choice of barrels, mags and Masterwork as far as your own preference is concerned, or for a slightly easier life, you can always go for Proximity Grenades. In your first trait column, Impulse Amplifier boosts velocity by 35% or Chain Reaction makes the most of your kills to damage anyone nearby, while Golden Tricorn gives a 15% damage boost after a kill, with no need to reload, extending the effective blast radius.

@title:Ep 289: Seraph Weapons
@description:Season 19's Season of the Seraph weapons

// Fire and Forget (PvP first-choice roll)
// Hammer-Forged Rifling, Accelerated Coils, Surplus, Vorpal Weapon
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. This is the first widely available Aggressive Frame LFR. The three-bolt shot will one-shot whether they're all body shots (base 77 damage each) or you hit a crit (264 damage), and with an ammo pickup giving five bursts (as at Season 19 v6.3.0.4), that's good power ammo economy. Stats are comparable to to Stormchaser, but with 1 extra zoom, which will help push out your aim assist cone. It's still worth pushing out your range a bit further using your barrel - Hammer-Forged Rifling has no downsides. The mag and Masterwork should be directed to reducing charge time as far as possible with Accelerated Coils - you can afford to lose a little impact. There's not much in either of the trait columns for PvP, unfortunately. For a straight duelling roll Surplus is probably the best first column trait for some extra Handling and Stability, with Vorpal Weapon in the second helping out with your taking down Guardians in a super. Recommended MW: Charge Time, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=2272041093&perks=3250034553,689005463,3436462433,1546637391

// Fire and Forget (PvP first-choice roll)
// Hammer-Forged Rifling, Accelerated Coils, Killing Wind, Vorpal Weapon
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. This is the first widely available Aggressive Frame LFR. The three-bolt shot will one-shot whether they're all body shots (base 77 damage each) or you hit a crit (264 damage), and with an ammo pickup giving five burst (as at Season 19 v6.3.0.4), that's good power ammo economy. Stats are comparable to to Stormchaser, but with 1 extra zoom, which will help push out your aim assist cone. It's still worth pushing out your range a bit further using your barrel - Hammer-Forged Rifling has no downsides. The mag and Masterwork should be directed to reducing charge time as far as possible with Accelerated Coils - you can afford to lose a little impact. There's not much in either of the trait columns for PvP, unfortunately. For a kill-chaining roll Killing Wind's gunfeel boosts make kills after your first easier, with Vorpal Weapon in the second helping out with your taking down Guardians in a super. Recommended MW: Charge Time, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=2272041093&perks=3250034553,689005463,2450788523,1546637391

// Tripwire Canary (PvP first-choice roll)
// Polymer String, (Fiberglass Arrow Shaft, Straight Fletching), Archer's Tempo, Swashbuckler
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. The bow looks bugged as at v6.3.0.4 as the draw time floor seems to be set at 540ms, rather than the usual 500ms for Lightweight bows - your best draw time will be the same as a Precision Bow, but you'll have less accuracy and do less damage. However, there's still an interesting option to make a kill-chaining roll worth using. Use your bowstring to reduce draw time - Polymer String does that and adds in a little extra accuracy too, Fiberglass Arrow Shaft or Straight Fletching improve accuracy (at the cost of a little stability for FAS). The default choice of Archer's Tempo is in the first trait column - this applies a scalar so will reduce your draw time to 420ms after a precision hit. Swashbuckler is where this bow starts to shine. While not as effective as when it's on Biting Winds, a melee kill to proc Swashbuckler x5 plus any other 10% damage boost (for example, Radiant) will one shot crit for as long as the boost lasts. Recommended MW: Charge Time, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3849444474&perks=852209214,3429800428,201365942,4082225868
dimwishlist:item=3849444474&perks=852209214,3827198035,201365942,4082225868

// Disparity (PvP first-choice roll)
// Arrowhead Brake, (Accurized Rounds, Tactical Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell), Eye of the Storm, Headseeker
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP, but you're still probably better off with Hakke Breach Armaments to take down Titan barriers. Lower stats than the only other kinetic slot aggressive pulse rifle, Sacred Provenance from Garden of Salvation, but this makes up with +1 Zoom, and some interesting PvP combinations. Out of the box TTK is 0.73s, but requires 8 crits and no body shots, which will be very difficult in practice. It's not possible to reduce the TTK significantly, no matter what damage boosts are applied, so aim to add to consistency and making the optimal TTK easier to achieve. The first thing to address is the recoil direction - Arrowhead Brake takes it straight to to 97, so is an easy choice. Accurized Rounds pushes out the range, or you can add to magazine size, stability, or a bit of both with Tactical Mag, Appended Mag or Flared Magwell. Eye of the Storm as your first trait provides passive handling and accuracy boosts just for taking damage in a gunfight, making use of the improved Headseeker trait easier, for hitting extra damage headshots after a body shot, and making the optimal TTK easier to hit, with 6c, 2b. Recommended MW: Stability or Range, with a Backup Mag, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,3142289711,699525795,460017080
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,106909392,699525795,460017080
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,1087426260,699525795,460017080
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,3230963543,699525795,460017080

// Disparity (PvP backup roll)
// Arrowhead Brake, (Accurized Rounds, Tactical Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell), (Moving Target, Rapid Hit, No Distractions), Headseeker
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . Backup PvP pick for duelling. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP, but you're still probably better off with Hakke Breach Armaments to take down Titan barriers quickly. Lower stats than the only other kinetic slot aggressive pulse rifle, Sacred Provenance from Garden of Salvation, but this makes up with +1 Zoom, and some interesting PvP combinations. Out of the box TTK is 0.73s, but requires 8 crits and no body shots, which will be very difficult in practice. It's not possible to reduce the TTK much no matter what damage boosts are applied, so aim to add to consistency, and making the optimal TTK easier to achieve. The first thing to address is the recoil direction - Arrowhead Brake takes it straight to to 97, so is an easy choice. Accurized Rounds pushes out the range, or you can add to magazine size, stability, or a bit of both with Tactical Mag, Appended Mag or Flared Magwell. The improved Headseeker trait, hitting extra damage headshots after a body shot, and making the optimal TTK easier to hit, with 6c, 2b is your best second column trait. While you're waiting to craft your own, Moving Target Rapid Hit or No Distractions work well in the first column to make hitting those crits a bit easier. Recommended MW: Stability or Range, with a Counterbalance, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,3142289711,588594999,460017080

// Disparity (PvP first-choice roll)
// Smallbore, (Accurized Rounds, Tactical Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell), Eye of the Storm, Headseeker
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP, but you're still probably better off with Hakke Breach Armaments to take down Titan barriers quickly. Lower stats than the only other kinetic slot aggressive pulse rifle, Sacred Provenance from Garden of Salvation, but this makes up with +1 Zoom, and some interesting PvP combinations. Out of the box TTK is 0.73s, but requires 8 crits and no body shots, which will be very difficult in practice. It's not possible to reduce the TTK much no matter what damage boosts are applied, so aim to add to consistency, and making the optimal TTK easier to achieve. If you want to push out your range a little more, and have a bit more stability to help control the recoil direction, Smallbore is your barrel of choice, with a Counterbalance Stock mod to help out too. Accurized Rounds pushes out the range, or you can add to magazine size, stability, or a bit of both with Tactical Mag, Appended Mag or Flared Magwell. Eye of the Storm as your first trait provides passive handling and accuracy boosts just for taking damage in a gunfight, making use of the improved Headseeker trait easier, for hitting extra damage headshots after a body shot, and making the optimal TTK easier to hit, with 6c, 2b. Recommended MW: Stability or Range, with a Counterbalance, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=1482024992,3142289711,699525795,460017080
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=1482024992,106909392,699525795,460017080
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=1482024992,1087426260,699525795,460017080
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=1482024992,3230963543,699525795,460017080

Lower stats than the only other kinetic slot aggressive pulse rifle, Sacred Provenance from Garden of Salvation, but this makes up with +1 Zoom, and some interesting PvP combinations. Out of the box TTK is 0.73s, but requires 8 crits and no body shots, which will be very difficult in practice. It's not possible to reduce the TTK much no matter what damage boosts are applied, so aim to add to consistency, and making the optimal TTK easier to achieve. If you want to push out your range a little more, and have a bit more stability to help control the recoil direction, Smallbore is your barrel of choice, with a Counterbalance Stock mod to help out too. The improved Headseeker trait, hitting extra damage headshots after a body shot, and making the optimal TTK easier to hit, with 6c, 2b is your best second column trait. // Disparity (PvP first-choice roll)
// Arrowhead Brake, (Accurized Rounds, Tactical Mag, Appended Mag, Flared Magwell), (Outloaw, Rapid Hit), Headstone
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling and Stasis subclasses. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP, but you're still probably better off with Hakke Breach Armaments to take down Titan barriers quickly. Lower stats than the only other kinetic slot aggressive pulse rifle, Sacred Provenance from Garden of Salvation, but this makes up with +1 Zoom, and some interesting PvP combinations. Out of the box TTK is 0.73s, but requires 8 crits and no body shots, which will be very difficult in practice. It's not possible to reduce the TTK much no matter what damage boosts are applied, so aim to add to consistency, and making the optimal TTK easier to achieve. The first thing to address is the recoil direction - Arrowhead Brake takes it straight to to 97, so is an easy choice. Accurized Rounds pushes out the range, or you can add to magazine size, stability, or a bit of both with Tactical Mag, Appended Mag or Flared Magwell. In modes with revives, Headstone crystals prevent opponents reviving teammates until they dissolve and, if anyone is trying, the Hakke origin trait lets you burst the crystal for AoE damage for an easy clean-up. Plus they obviously work well with Stasis subclass abilities too. Outlaw procs on a crit kill, or Rapid Hit procs on crit hits (which you should hopefully be getting a lot of) to synergise. Recommended MW: Stability or Range, with a Counterbalance, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,3142289711,1168162263,124408337
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,106909392,1168162263,124408337
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,1087426260,1168162263,124408337
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,3230963543,1168162263,124408337
dimwishlist:item=1751893422&perks=839105230,3142289711,247725512,124408337

First-choice PvP pick for duelling and Stasis subclasses. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP, but you're still probably better off with Hakke Breach Armaments to take down Titan barriers quickly. // Path of Least Resistance (PvP first-choice roll)
// Hammer-Forged Rifling, Projection Fuse, Dynamic Sway Reducation, Harmony
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. Trace rifles are a lot easier to use since the October 2022 v6.2.5 stability buff, so you can go all into range with your barrel and and perks. Out-of-the-box TTK is 0.73s with 11 crits and a body, and Accuracy-Adjusted TTK is 0.8s (8c, 5b). Dynamic Sway Reduction is really helpful to keeping your reticule on target and making the most of your ammo while, for kill-chaining, Harmony drops your TTK to 0.6s (10c), AATTK 0.67s (6c, 5b) after a primary or power weapon kill. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=2827764482&perks=3250034553,2969185026,1359896290,438098033

// Path of Least Resistance (PvP first-choice roll)
// Hammer-Forged Rifling, Projection Fuse, Hip-Fire Grip, Gutshot Straight
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling as a holdout weapon. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. Trace rifles are a lot easier to use since the October 2022 v6.2.5 stability buff, so you can go all into range with your barrel and and perks. Out-of-the-box TTK is 0.73s with 11 crits and a body, and Accuracy-Adjusted TTK is 0.8s (8c, 5b). To use as a holdout weapon, Hip-Fire Grip saves you ADSing, while Gutshot Straight (particularly the Enhanced version, to mitigate the accuracy penalties), results in a good bodyshot TTK of 0.87s. Recommended MW: Range, with a Freehand Grip, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=2827764482&perks=3250034553,2969185026,1866048759,1365187766

// Judgment of Kelgorath (PvP first-choice roll)
// Supercooled Accelerator, Accurized Rounds, Shot Swap, Surrounded
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. This is the first legendary aggressive frame glaive, with an on-paper glacial TTK of 1.33s in two shots - try tat in open play and you'll end up very dead, so you'll need to adjust your playstyle. This has a higher range than adaptive frames and good aim assist (although you can't hit a crit), but lower handling and shield duration. A lack of crits means glaives are surprisingly useful in aerial combat as accuracy angle penalties have less of an impact. Start by maxing the range with your haft and magazine - Supercooled Accelerator does this without harming your already poor shield duration, and then accurized rounds, and a range Masterwork get you to 100 for the best base bolt speed. There's not that much for PvP in the first trait column - Shot Swap can be very useful to overcome the poor handling. The real juice is in the last column - Surrounded when procced, not even needing the Enhanced version, will one-hit kill any resilience. Recommended MW: Range, with a Freehand Grip, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=2978226043&perks=1934171651,3142289711,2586829431,3708227201

// Judgment of Kelgorath (PvP first-choice roll)
// Supercooled Accelerator, Accurized Rounds, Shot Swap, Impulse Amplifier
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. This is the first legendary aggressive frame glaive, with an on-paper glacial TTK of 1.33s in two shots - try tat in open play and you'll end up very dead, so you'll need to adjust your playstyle. This has a higher range than adaptive frames and good aim assist (although you can't hit a crit), but lower handling and shield duration. A lack of crits means glaives are surprisingly useful in aerial combat as accuracy angle penalties have less of an impact. Start by maxing the range with your haft and magazine - Supercooled Accelerator does this without harming your already poor shield duration, and then accurized rounds, and a range Masterwork get you to 100 for the best base bolt speed. There's not that much for PvP in the first trait column - Shot Swap can be very useful to overcome the poor handling. In the second trait column, Impulse Amplifier boosts the bolt speed further, for better hit registration. Recommended MW: Range, with a Freehand Grip, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=2978226043&perks=1934171651,3142289711,2586829431,951095735

// Retrofit Escapade (PvP first-choice roll)
// (Smallbore, Hammer-Forged Rifling), Accurized Rifling, Field Prep, Tap the Trigger
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for duelling. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. Rapid-fire LMG go brrrr... Rapid fires have a base TTK of 0.53s with 7 crits and 2 body shots, or an Accuracy Adjusted TTK of 0.6s (4c, 6b). Decent stats - aim assist and stability are relatively high. The LMG ammo economy means, if you're using one, you have to make the most of every shot. Push out the range with your barrel and mag with Hammer-Forged Rifling and and Accurized Rounds, or add in a touch of stability with Smallbore. Then Field Prep increases the rounds you pull from a power ammo brick, while Tap the Trigger benefits last for exactly the 0.6s that it should take you to a kill. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-Duel, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3103325054&perks=1482024992,3142289711,2869569095,1890422124
dimwishlist:item=3103325054&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2869569095,1890422124

// Retrofit Escapade (PvP first-choice roll)
// (Smallbore, Hammer-Forged Rifling), Accurized Rifling, Zen Moment, Tap the Trigger
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. Rapid-fire LMG go brrrr... Rapid fires have a base TTK of 0.53s with 7 crits and 2 body shots, or an Accuracy Adjusted TTK of 0.6s (4c, 6b). Decent stats - aim assist and stability are relatively high. The LMG ammo economy means, if you're using one, you have to make the most of every shot. Push out the range with your barrel and mag with Hammer-forged Rifling and and Accurized Rounds, or add in a touch of stability with Smallbore. Zen Moment makes bursts easier to control, while Tap the Trigger benefits last for exactly the 0.6s that it should take you to a kill. Recommended MW: Range, with a Freehand Grip, Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3103325054&perks=1482024992,3142289711,2387244414,1890422124
dimwishlist:item=3103325054&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2387244414,1890422124

// Retrofit Escapade (PvP first-choice roll)
// (Smallbore, Hammer-Forged Rifling), Accurized Rifling, Field Prep, Golden Tricorn
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. Rapid-fire LMG go brrrr... Rapid fires have a base TTK of 0.53s with 7 crits and 2 body shots, or an Accuracy Adjusted TTK of 0.6s (4c, 6b). Decent stats - aim assist and stability are relatively high. The LMG ammo economy means, if you're using one, you have to make the most of every shot. Push out the range with your barrel and mag with Hammer-forged Rifling and and Accurized Rounds, or add in a touch of stability with Smallbore. Then Field Prep increases the rounds you pull from a power ammo brick, while Golden Tricorn acts as a better Rampage, reducing the number of bullets and crits to kill, and pairing nicely with Hunter Gyrfalcon void volatile rounds for additional fun. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
dimwishlist:item=3103325054&perks=1482024992,3142289711,2869569095,2610012052
dimwishlist:item=3103325054&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2869569095,2610012052

// (Smallbore, Hammer-Forged Rifling), Accurized Rifling, Zen Moment, Golden Tricorn
//notes:Inspired by @DestinyMBP Podcast 289 with @illPhysics and @Legoleflash (https://open.spotify.com/episode/0PFItMQa4h8rIpPXRL3rHr?si=deea5dea1e924b66). . First-choice PvP pick for kill-chaining with a void subclass. Shapeable. The Ambush origin trait provides extra range and handling for the first 2.5s of an encounter, with a 5s reset timer, so works well for PvP. Rapid-fire LMG go brrrr... Rapid fires have a base TTK of 0.53s with 7 crits and 2 body shots, or an Accuracy Adjusted TTK of 0.6s (4c, 6b). Decent stats - aim assist and stability are relatively high. The LMG ammo economy means, if you're using one, you have to make the most of every shot. Push out the range with your barrel and mag with Hammer-forged Rifling and and Accurized Rounds, or add in a touch of stability with Smallbore. Zen Moment makes bursts easier to control, while Golden Tricorn acts as a better Rampage, reducing the number of bullets and crits to kill, and pairing nicely with Hunter Gyrfalcon void volatile rounds for additional fun. Recommended MW: Range, with a Quick Access Sling, Sprint Grip or Targeting Adjuster mod depending on your preference. Tags: PvP, PvP-KillChain, PvP-God, MKB, Controller
